author: Nick Nairn
method: In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mango, whipped cream, honey, lime juice and zest and spoon into a serving glass. Garnish with an extra drizzle of honey, lime wedges and mint sprigs.
ingredients: ½ mango, skin and stone removed, chopped,  150ml/5¼fl oz double cream, lightly whipped,  1 tbsp honey, plus extra for drizzling,  ½ lime, juice and zest only,  lime wedges and fresh mint sprigs, to garnish
